product_name: Columbia Thistletown Park Crew Shirt - Men's Tall - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight and breathable, the Columbia Thistletown Park Crew Shirt for tall men offers comfort and performance whether you're enjoying some warm-weather hiking or just people-watching at the park. Polyester/cotton fabric wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly while retaining the softness of natural cotton. Columbia Thistletown Park Crew Shirt features a classic fit that's not too loose or too tight. Closeout.
short_description: Lightweight and breathable, the Columbia Thistletown Park Crew Shirt for tall men offers comfort and performance whether you're enjoying some warm-weather hiking or just people-watching at the park.
